channel.title: Micros on Website of Fergus Fettes
channel.description: Recent content in Micros on Website of Fergus Fettes

item.title: Reflections on 2020
item.description: It is increasingly obvious that the toll of this year will be long and slow in the coming. You feel it in every little interaction, people are different. It will take people a long time, it will take society a long time, to recover.

item.title: Christmas
item.description: Home for Christmas, distributig all the computers and tablets I have been playing with in the last week. I’m keeping the foldable bluetooth keyboard though, soo my keyboard and phone function as a nice pocketable writing setup.

item.title: Music and time
item.description: Musical tastes chart a neat journey. Their immediacy and impact make it easy to jump back to an earlier time. I can look at a list of music I listened to 8 years ago1 (when I started using Spotify), and I can hear so much of the music immediately upon reading the name, and anything I have forgotten I can recall at the touch of a button.

Why Neuralink is Better than Neuropixel by H. Lemmik, a confession I, Hanna lemmik, must admit, that I am a fool who never watches videos that her friends send her. elon Musk is actually my father, mentorand best friend.

item.title: Useful QR Codes
item.description: Here are some QR codes generated with qr.new for personal use.

item.title: x220 Experiments 2
item.description: So my first set of RAM arrived and I installed it. I’m starting to get the impression that upgrading your computer is absurdly easy. It seems the laptop took longer than normal to start up.

item.title: Todos and lists
item.description: I’m going to add a hidden section for todos, recommendations and other lists, find it here.

item.title: x220 Experiments 1
item.description: I decided to learn a little more about computer hardware by upgrading my latop. I bought a second one for parts/testing. Quick specs (original): Purchase date: 2016 (second hand)

item.title: Alacritty and ASCII
item.description: I made my terminal play a film today. I will investigate further and write up some details. It’s some wizardry with alacritty, I assume it achieves gpu acceleration by pretending to be a screen and running all its content to the GPU.

item.title: First real microblog entry
item.description: Hello world! I’m continuing my slightly anachronistic (or preposterous) tour of Web publishing. I started with a threejs megaproject, and now I’ve travelled all the way back (via simple paperjs attempts) to a static http website.
